Name: Address Line 1 Description
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: First line of the address, which includes street and building number.

Name: Agreement
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A mutual understanding between two or more parties, each committing themselves to fulfill one or more obligations. An agreement can be a financial services contract, an intermediary agreement, a provider agreement or an employment agreement.

Name: Area Polygon
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A set of points on a map which define a boundary.

Name: Area within Impact Zone
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A binary flag that indicates whether a given property falls under a loss impact zone.

Name: Assessment and Score
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: An assessment or score that indicates the magnitude of an event

Name: Base Flood Elevation
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The elevation to which the flood is anticipated to rise during the base flood.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Event

Name: Basement Surface Area
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The surface area of the building basement floor.

Name: Calendar Date
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Calendar date expressed in the standard format of the insurance company. Time in day is a dimension member of Calendar Date and indicates the time in day when activity or event has taken place.

Name: Catastrophe Code
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Code used by the insurance authorities, for example the Association of British Insurers, to identify the event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Event

Name: City Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Identifies the label assigned to or by which a city may be identified, for example: Chicago, Dublin, Sydney.

Name: Claim
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A formal process to an insurance company asking for a payment based on the terms of an insurance policy.

Name: Claim Deductible Amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Total deductible (or excess) amount which must be paid by the insured under the claim or claim item. At elementary claim level derived from the applicable deductibles for the coverage components against which the claim benefit is requested.  At claim folder level derived from the deductibles at the elementary claim level adjusted with deductibles applied to the insurance policies against which the claim is recorded.

Name: Claim Description
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A free-text statement used to explain what is represented by this claim.

Name: Claim Handler Party
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Person, for example the insurance company employee or independent loss adjuster, who is responsible for settling the claim.

Name: Claim Identifier
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The number or code assigned to the claim by the insurance company for identification or communication purposes.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Claim Outstanding Amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Amount which the insurance company still expects to pay out in respect of the claim or claim item.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Claims paid net of reinsurance
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Net claims paid for the financial year in question, after reinsurance and excluding claims management costs.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Construction End Date
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The date the construction of the property was ended.

Name: Construction Material
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Identifies a classification of buildings (Structures) according to their construction material.

Name: Construction Start Date
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The date the construction of the property was started.

Name: Construction Type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: With regard to residential building insurance a distinction is made based on the material used for the construction.

Name: Coordinates
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The location of the place, expressed in measurements with respect to a commonly used reference system.  The coordinates identify both the reference system and the values with respect to the dimensions of the reference system. Coordinates can be used to define targeted areas in marketing activities.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Area Polygon

Name: Damage Impact Zone
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A zone that is classified as to whether it is impacted due to the event in terms of damage magnitude.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Assessment and Score

Name: Distance
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The distance between one point and the next point in the shape.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Geometric Shape
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Area Polygon

Name: Distance to Nearest Impact Zone
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Distance to the nearest zone that is classified as to whether it is impacted due to the event in terms of damage magnitude.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Assessment and Score

Name: Email Address
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: An electronic address that can be used to send and receive correspondence over a computer network, for example: jsmith@jonesinc.com.

Name: Estimated Claim Amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Likely total value of the claim estimated by the insurance company when the claim was opened up to the point that the claim is finally settled.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Estimated Claim Settlement
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Total value of the claim settlement cost estimated by the insurance company for a property when the claim was opened up to the point that the claim is finally settled.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Event
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A happening that is of interest to the modelled organization.

Name: Event Area
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Geographical area impacted by the event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Event

Name: Event Duration
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Duration of the event (days from start).
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Event

Name: Event Time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The time at which the event is considered to have happened.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Event

Name: Extended Coverage
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The insurance of additional perils. For example : willful damages, strike, etc. In most cases extended coverage constitutes a supplement to fire and fire business interruption insurance for industrial and commercial enterprises.  It indicates that the insurance contains all perils and liability in the event, may be higher than with standard insurance policies.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Agreement

Name: Flood Area
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description:
A risk area that identifies a geographical area as a single unit to which a same set of flood risk characteristics apply.
It describes the boundaries of the area that is considered as exposed to a same level of flood risk.

Name: Geometric Shape
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A geometric shape is a shape used to describe the outline of a boundary, line or area.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Area Polygon

Name: Geometric Shape Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Name of geometric shape.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Geometric Shape
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Area Polygon

Name: Impact Score
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The metric showing the assessed or observed severity of the damage incurred to the property. This could be based on a physical inspection or based on observation based on change detected from satellite observations before and after the loss event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Assessment and Score

Name: Insurance Claim Amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Amount claimed as insurance from the policy provider.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Insurance Policy
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The unique identifier of an insurance policy.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Agreement

Name: Insurance Product
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A definition of a type of financial services product, that is complete and has or can be released to the market.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Product

Name: Insurer
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A party who offers protection to the insured in a financial services agreement. It is the insurance company that actually underwrites and issues the insurance contract.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Party

Name: Latitude
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A geographic coordinate that specifies the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface. Values can range from -90 (south) to 90 (north).

Name: Layer Reference
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The external reference given for layer shape in a map.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Geometric Shape
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Area Polygon

Name: Line of Business
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description:
Identification of the line of business, as defined in Annex I to Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/35, reported. The following closed list shall be used:
1 — 1 and 13 Medical expense insurance
2 — 2 and 14 Income protection insurance
3 — 3 and 15 Workers' compensation insurance
4 — 4 and 16 Motor vehicle liability insurance
5 — 5 and 17 Other motor insurance
6 — 6 and 18 Marine, aviation and transport insurance
7 — 7 and 19 Fire and other damage to property insurance
8 — 8 and 20 General liability insurance
9 — 9 and 21 Credit and suretyship insurance
10 — 10 and 22 Legal expenses insurance
11 — 11 and 23 Assistance
12 — 12 and 24 Miscellaneous financial loss
25 — Non–proportional health reinsurance
26 — Non–proportional casualty reinsurance
27 — Non–proportional marine, aviation and transport reinsurance
28 — Non–proportional property reinsurance
{Alt Definition}
Line of business as defined in Annex 1 of Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/35The following closed list shall be used:
29 Health insurance
30 Insurance with profit participation
31 Index linked and unit linked insurance
32 Other life insurance
33 Annuities stemming from nonlife insurance contracts and relating to health insurance obligations
34 Annuities stemming from nonlife insurance contracts and relating to insurance obligations other than health insurance obligations
35 Health reinsurance
36 Life reinsurance

Name: Location Resolution
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The resolution of a shape which defines how precise the location information is.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Geometric Shape

Name: Longitude
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A geographic coordinate that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface.

Name: Loss Event
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A specific incident that results or may result in a claim for an insurance benefit.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Natural Phenomenon Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Name of the loss event that occurs and is unavoidable because it is not the responsibility of an object or human being. For example : Hurricane Laura.

Name: Nearest Impacted Zone Score
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The metric showing the assessed or observed severity of the damage incurred to the property in the nearest impacted zone.

Name: Nearest Impact Zone
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The nearest zone that is classified as to whether it is impacted due to the event in terms of damage magnitude.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Assessment and Score

Name: Number of Points
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Number of points used to capture the shape of a boundary or line.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Geometric Shape
Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Flood Area

Name: Number of Rooms
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The number of rooms the property was constructed with.

Name: Occupancy Period
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The period of occupancy of the property. For example : including day and night, daytime only, weekends only.

Name: Owner Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Name of the owner of the property.

Name: Party
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A person or an organization.

Name: Place Population Density
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The classification of places by their density of human population.

Name: Previous Claims
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The number of previous claims made for the property.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Product
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Product identifies goods and services that can be offered, sold, or purchased by the customers.

Name: Property Damage Cost
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The cost of the damages incurred to the property.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Claim

Name: Property Identifier
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The unique identifier of a property.

Name: Property Size
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The size of property in terms of area.

Name: Property Type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Code indicating the structure type of the building in which the household lives. For example : commercial or residential.

Name: Property Value
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The market value of the household's primary residential home.

Name: Protection Category
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The category of protection of the property. For example : flood protected, unprotected.

Name: Renovation Date
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The date of renovation of the property.

Name: Replacement Value
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The cost of replacing an existing property with a similar property at the current market price.

Name: Risk Area
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: A place that identifies a geographical area as a single unit to which a same set of risk conditions apply. It describes the boundaries of the area that is considered as exposed to a same level of risk.  Identifies a place as it can be found on a risk place map.

Name: Standard Policy Deductible
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The total deductible applicable for a given coverage.

Name: Sum Insured Limit
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The highest limit of amount that the insurer can be obliged to pay out under the policy.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data >> Agreement

Name: Telephone Number
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: The general-purpose telephone information that is needed to contact a wired or wireless telephone device.

Name: Year Electricity Upgraded
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Year when the building was last electrically wired or re-wired.

Name: Year Heating Upgraded
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Year when the heating system in the building was last upgraded.

Name: Year Plumbing Upgraded
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Year when the plumbing system in the building was last upgraded.

Name: Year Roof Upgraded
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Year when the roof of the building was constructed of the current materials.

Name: Years Since Construction
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Insurance Loss Estimation using Remote Sensing Data
Description: Number of years since the construction of a property.
